virality_potential.justification: Humorous critique of crypto market trends with celebrity mention could resonate within crypto communities.

informative_value.justification: Primarily commentary without substantive data or actionable information.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral/sarcastic tone without clear positive or negative emotional language.

duration_of_impact.justification: Tied to transient market conditions rather than lasting concepts.
